_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Laravel
author: cohohohn04@gmail.com
description: Laravel application server with GitHub deployment, version matrix support, and package installation.
startup: cd /home/container || exit 1; if [ -n "$USERNAME" ] && [ -n "$ACCESS_TOKEN" ] && [ -n "$GITHUB_REPO_URL" ]; then if [ -d .git ]; then echo -e "[SETUP] Updating the repository"; git fetch --all && git reset --hard origin/"$BRANCH"; else GITHUB_REPO_URL="https://$USERNAME:$ACCESS_TOKEN@${GITHUB_REPO_URL#https://}"; echo -e "[SETUP] Cloning the repository"; git clone -b "$BRANCH" "$GITHUB_REPO_URL" /home/container/tmp && mv /home/container/tmp/.git . && rm -rf /home/container/tmp && git reset --hard; fi; else echo -e "[ERROR] Missing GitHub credentials or repository URL"; exit 1; fi; if [ -f composer.json ]; then echo -e "[SETUP] Install Composer packages"; composer install; else echo -e "[ERROR] No valid composer.json file found for Composer"; exit 1; fi; if [ -f package.json ]; then echo -e "[SETUP] Install NPM packages"; npm install; if [ -f vite.config.js ]; then echo -e "[SETUP] Build Assets with Vite"; npm run build; else echo -e "[ERROR] No valid Vite file found for Vite"; fi; else echo -e "[ERROR] No valid package.json file found for NPM"; fi; php artisan migrate --no-interaction --force; if [ "$WEB_SERVER" = "artisan" ] || ! command -v nginx > /dev/null 2>&1; then php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port="$SERVER_PORT" & fi; while true; do read -r cmd; if [ -n "$cmd" ]; then eval "$cmd"; fi; done;

variables.name: GitHub Repository URL
variables.description: The URL of your GitHub repository.

variables.name: Git Access Token
variables.description: Your GitHub token for accessing the repository.

variables.name: Git Username
variables.description: Username for accessing the GitHub repository.

variables.name: Git Branch
variables.description: The branch of the repository to clone. Default is 'main'.

variables.name: Web Server
variables.description: Choose between Nginx + PHP-FPM or PHP Artisan Serve (nginx, artisan).
